welcome.title: Welcome **{display_name}**!
welcome.intro:
I will guide you through the registration process to join the team.
Answer the following questions.

*If a button doesn't respond on first click, just click again.*
welcome.already_registered: You are already registered and validated!

language.question: Choisis ta langue / Select your language

charte.intro:
# 1ï¸âƒ£ Server Rules

Before continuing, please read the charter carefully.
charte.instruction: Open the file, read it entirely, then click the button to accept.
charte.instruction_url:
ğŸ“œ **Read the charter here:** {url}

Once read, click the button below to accept.
charte.accept_button: I have read and accept the charter
charte.refused:
Accepting the charter is **mandatory** to join the team.
Your registration has been cancelled.

If you change your mind, type `!inscription` to start again.
charte.timeout: Time expired. Type `!inscription` to start again.

profile.title: # 4ï¸âƒ£ Complete your profile
profile.keep_or_reset: Do you want to **keep** this information or **delete all** and start over?

players.team_main:
## 4.1 Players in Team 1
*(Separate names with `,` or type `.` if none)*
players.team_other:
## 4.2 Players in Team 2
*(Separate names with `,` or type `.` if none)*
players.already_exists: Member **{member}** already has a player named **{player_name}** in {team_name}.

location.title: ## 4.3 Your location *(optional)*
location.intro: *(Enter your location, from country to full postal address, or `.` to skip)*
location.map_update: ğŸ—ºï¸ *The members map will be updated in ~2 minutes.*
location.not_found: Location not found. You can change it later with `!profil`.
location.invalid: Invalid location (too long or forbidden characters). You can try again later.
location.service_error: Location service unavailable. You can try again later.
location.error: Error during location search. You can try again later.

finish.title: **Registration complete!**
finish.pending:
Your registration is now **pending validation** by a Sage.
You will be notified once your application is reviewed.

Use `!profil` to see your information.
finish.approved:
Congratulations! Your application has been **approved** by {sage_name}.
You now have access to all server channels.

Welcome to the team!
finish.refused: Your application has been **refused** by a Sage.
finish.refused_contact:
If you think this is a mistake, write the reason in this channel.
**DO NOT WRITE TO THE BOT**, it cannot process that.

errors.dm_failed: I cannot send you a private message. Check your settings.
errors.sage_only: This command is reserved for Sages.
errors.rate_limited: You are using this command too often. Please wait {seconds} seconds.

commands.inscription_public: I'm sending you the instructions in private message...
commands.joueur_public: I'm sending you the form in private message...
commands.sent_dm: I sent you the information in private message.

help_cmd.title: ğŸ“š Available Commands
help_cmd.subtitle: Use `!help <command>` for more details.
help_cmd.general_list:
`!help` - Show this help
`!language / !langue` - Change your language (FR/EN)
`!site` - Link to the team website
help_cmd.profile_list:
`!inscription` - Start registration
`!profil` - Show your profile
`!player / !joueur` - Manage your players
`!location / !localisation` - Set your location
`!users / !membres` - List members
`!map / !carte` - Interactive members map
help_cmd.sages_list:
`!pending / !attente` - Pending registrations
`!approve / !valider` - Approve a member
`!refuse / !refuser` - Reject a member
`!profil-admin @user` - Full profile
`!reset @user` - Reset a member
`!delete / !supprimer` - Delete a member (GDPR)
`!metrics / !stats` - Bot statistics
`!audit-permissions` - Permissions audit
help_cmd.footer: This Is PSG - Tennis Clash Team
help_cmd.unknown_cmd: Command `{cmd}` not found. Use `!help` for the list.

sages_cmd.charte_not_validated: {member} has not validated the charter yet.
sages_cmd.validated_success: {member} has been validated and promoted to Member by **{sage_name}**!
sages_cmd.welcome_public:
ğŸ‰ Welcome {member} to the team **{guild}**!
Your application has been approved. You now have access to all channels.
